articles.title: OpenAI's Sora text-to-video generator will be publicly available later this year - The Verge
articles.description: In an interview with The Wall Street Journal, OpenAI chief technology officer Mira Murati says Sora, the company’s AI text-to-video generator, will be publicly available this year.

articles.author: Jon Brodkin
articles.title: Apple to allow iOS app installs from websites, but small devs don't qualify - Ars Technica
articles.description: To qualify, devs need an app installed by 1 million users in EU the prior year.
